name: RocketOwl Inc.
tag_list: apple, canada, first, facebook, flash, gaming, greenspace, ios, mobile, clean-tech, ottawa, ontario, start-up, games, news, vlog
overview:
RocketOwl Inc. is a game development company that specializes in creating high-quality, fun and engaging games for online social and mobile networks. With a focus on becoming a leader in gaming for social change, they promote environmentalism and sustainable living. Their vision is to deliver the best gaming experience possible, while affecting positive social change around the world through play.

RocketOwl is developing their own original titles for multiple platforms, and is among the first companies to provide cross-platform play across all devices. With an emphasis on creating a fundamentally fun game first, the company is able to spread its powerful message to users around the world.

RocketOwl’s games are available on Facebook and iOS for the iPad, and are coming soon to Android and Windows 8.
